June 20, 1971 D Bo'ness Contest

March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Glebe Park, Bo'ness, West Lothian March contest - 1st Whitburn. Hymn tune contest - 1st Bo'ness. Best section 2 band - Cowdenbeath. Best section 3 band - Tayport Instrumental. Best section 4 band - Shotts St Patrick. 9 bands competed.
April 22, 2013, 11:09 a.m. April 22, 2013, 11:59 a.m.
